The Challenge Network
INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Congratulations on your commitment and contribution to The Challenge this autumn!
You are warmly invited to The Challenge Graduation Ceremony along with two guests. At the event you and your team will be awarded your graduation certificates and will become official graduates of The Challenge, as well as graduates of the National Citizen Service (NCS).
So now you have completed The Challenge, you might be wondering what’s next? The good news is, this is not the end… it’s only the beginning! An exciting part of Graduation is the launch of The Challenge Society – which will give you the chance to stay involved in so many new and exciting ways. If you want to keep this amazing experience going don’t miss 'The Festival' which will be coming to a town near you in February. This will will be a fantastic opportunity for you to reunite, make new friends and have fun!
I wish you a great Christmas holiday and I am looking forward to seeing you at your Graduation.
Caroline Mumford
Programme Manager
Where: Barbican Centre 4th Floor Conservatory Terrace Silk Street London EC2Y 8DS
When: Saturday 12th January
2pm-4.30pm
Driving and Parking Instructions: There is parking available at the Barbican car park but this is charged. For more information please check the Barbican website.
The nearest tube stations are Barbican which is on the Hammersmith and Circle lines and Moorgate which is on the Northern, Hammersmith and Circle lines. Both stations are approximately five minutes walk away from the Barbican.
